 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0004239
 * *Label* = small intestine smooth muscle
 * *Definition* = A portion of smooth muscle tissue that is part of a small intestine [Automatically generated definition].
 * *Comment* = MA class may specifically mean muscle layer, but we treat as the sum of smooth muscle in both muscle layer and muscularis mucosa

## Synonyms

 * small intestine involuntary muscle
 * small intestine non-striated muscle
 * small intestine smooth muscle tissue
 * smooth muscle of small bowel
 * smooth muscle of small intestine
 * smooth muscle tissue of small bowel
 * smooth muscle tissue of small intestine
